title: Enterprise-level IoT Security Assessment
summary: Comprehensive security assessment of industrial IoT devices across 12 manufacturing facilities, identifying and remediating critical vulnerabilities.

title: Healthcare Provider Attack Surface Reduction
summary: Reduced external attack surface by 62% through continuous monitoring and systematic vulnerability remediation for a network of 200+ healthcare facilities.

title: Financial Services API Security Hardening
summary: Identified and secured critical vulnerabilities in customer-facing APIs, preventing potential data breaches and implementing continuous security monitoring.

title: Smart City Infrastructure Security Program
summary: Developed and implemented a comprehensive security program for smart city IoT infrastructure, including traffic systems, environmental sensors, and public utilities.

title: Retail Chain POS System Protection
summary: Secured point-of-sale systems across 500+ locations through continuous monitoring, threat detection, and rapid incident response capabilities.
